sentence.Network_en: She was never the same after Father married Topaz.

sentence.Network_en: A pale yellow variety of crystalline quartz resembling topaz.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种类似黄玉的黄色石英,等次稍低.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 黄玉(topaz),为了不与黄色的和田玉(简称黄玉)相混,这一名称现已改译为"托帕石"(系按其英文名的音译). 世界上很多地方都产托帕石: 巴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a yellow sapphire): from Old French topace, via Latin from Greek topazos

entry.def: A topaz is a precious stone which is usually yellowish-brown in colour.

means.word_mean: 2. a mineral (fluosilicate of aluminum) that occurs in crystals of various colors and is used as a gemstone
